div.style: width:100%; height:100%; font-family:'Courier New', monospace; color:#2d2a24; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:14px; padding:6px; box-sizing:border-box;

div.div: Stained paper strip. Handwritten: "Essai #402". Viscous yellow oil, spicy floral nose.

div.style: background:#fff7c2; border:1.5px solid #2d2a24; border-radius:10px; padding:8px 10px; box-shadow:2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
display:flex; gap:18px; align-items:center; padding:10px 12px; background:#fdf9ec; border:1.5px solid #2d2a24; border-radius:12px; overflow:auto;
width:520px; height:64px; background:#fdf9ec; border:1.5px solid #2d2a24; border-radius:8px; position:relative; box-shadow:1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
position:absolute; left:16px; top:12px; width:120px; height:40px; background:#d7c3a3; opacity:0.55; border-radius:6px;
position:absolute; left:170px; top:16px; width:260px; height:32px; border-radius:10px; background:linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(240,214,127,0.9), rgba(208,169,76,0.7));
position:absolute; left:26px; top:20px; font-size:16px; font-weight:700; color:#1f2d25;
